name: Ajay Kumar Sahu
summary: Offering nearly 12 years of experience in Software/Application Development with expertise in all phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), project management, and clean coding practices. Highly skilled in building relationships with stakeholders and presenting project changes, issues, risks, and contingency plans.

education.institution: IIMT College of Engineering, Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh Technical University
